Quote: I have a 12:34 representational time dance. I do it at 3:33 every other Tuesday (twice a day). If youâ€™d like to participate in my choreographed dance routine, bring a football helmet and a half empty can of tuna (keeps the stray cats away, because I perform in a gritty, grimy downtown alley).
